Hi! I am Bratislav (Slava) Melandovich, expert & consultant with 10 years of vast experience in IT business, CEO-FOUNDER of ANVI (IT outsourcing and outstaffing), and JOBITT (ANONYMOUS IT JOB SEARCH).
